Service Details: - Offers quality child care for children before and after school during scheduled school breaks- Programs are centered on core values of caring, honesty, respect and responsibility, and include a healthy program structure of:  45 minute of daily exercise- Art, games, reading and science activities- Healthy snacks and nutritional learning- Community giving and charity- Out trips and local exploration- Lessons in sharing and healthy relationships
Hours: Before School Care, K-6: 6:30am - 8:30amKelowna Family Y, 375 Hartman Rd, 250.491.9622 ext.203Quigley Elementary, 705 Kitch Rd, 250.491.9622 ext.203 (for children who attend Quigley Elementary)Please note:  Drops children off at the following schools: Pearson, Belgo, Rutland, South Rutland, Black Mountain ElementaryAfter School Care:  K-6: 2:30pm - 6pmBlack Mountain Elementary, 1650 Gallagher Rd, 250.491.9622 ext.203Quigley Elementary, 705 Kitch Rd, 250.491.9622 ext.203 Rosevalley Elementary, 1680 Westlake Rd, 250.491.962. ext.212Please note:  Picks up children from Pearson, Belgo, Rutland and South Rutland and provides care at Quigley Elementary
How to Apply: Please call for additional information and to register
